title: Wasabi Power Battery (2-Pack) and Charger for Sony NP-BX1, NP-BX1/M8
feature: Includes 2 batteries and 1 charger for the Sony NP-BX1; Each battery features Japanese cells, 3.6V, 1600mAh
Compatible with Sony AS20, AS100, AS200, CX405, CX440, H300, HX90V, MV1, RX100, X1000, and other models (see description)
Mini rapid AC charger features a fold-out US plug, 110-240V input voltage, car charging adapter, and European plug
Batteries and chargers are fully compatible with the Sony original battery and charger
All items include a 3-year manufacturer warranty
description: The Wasabi Power NPBX1 battery and charger kit includes 2 batteries and one charger with a European plug and car adapter. All items meet or exceed OEM standards and come with a 3-year manufacturer warranty. Batteries replace Sony NP-BX1.
